title: Rhea
description1: You can search for any course by name or course code
description2: If you sign in you can can add courses to your schedule and subscribe to a custom schedule feed
description3: Of course you can view a single course and subscribe to it's schedule feed. Contrariety to kronox this subscription does update regularly in your calendar automatically.
notSubscribedToAnyCalendar: You are not subscribed to any calendar
deleteMyAccountMessage1: Are you sure you want to delete your user? All data will be deleted and you will not be able to recover it.
deleteMyAccountMessage2: This action is permanent. After the user is deleted you can still login with same account, but a new user will be created.
stilInDevelopmentMessage: This is a work in progress, there is for sure going to be some bugs.
disclaimer: This project does not have any affiliation with MÃ¤lardalens university or Kronox. This project is entirely created for making it easier for students to find courses and subscribe to them. The project is open source and can be found on GitHub.
callToActionh1: A platform for students by students
aboutText: Rhea is a platform for students created by students. The goal is to make it easier for students to find courses and subscribe to them. Rhea also provides a platform for students find on campus events and discover student unions. All development is on our freetime, for any questions or suggestions, please write to us on GitHub!
name: Name
newUnionText: Request to create a new union!
